Yale Computer Society: Promoting tech & etrepreneurship at Yale. Back to main website.

Alumni of YCS

Students who were members and advisors of YCS for at least one semester

Leaving Spring 2017

    Stephanie Hickman '19

    Stephanie served as our first Culture Chair. She hosted the first social events for club members and helped outline the role for future Chairs.

    Cristobal Gonzalez '20

    Gala Lead

    CristobalÂ lead the team that organized the first YCS Prize, for best software project submitted by Yale students.

    Nishitha Burman '20

    Community Director

    Nishitha was the first dedicated writer of our Newsletter and one of the first members of our community team.

    Lasya Sreepada '19

    Gala Lead

    Lasya lead the team that organized the very first YCS Gala. She worked under a strict deadline to figure out logistics for the event and delegate work to her team.

    Emmett Chen-Ran '20

    Community Director

    Emmett was one of our first community directors.

    Christopher Kim '19

    Partnerships Director

    Christopher lead our first team dedicated to establishing partnerships with companies and reaching out to Yale alumni. He helped secure money for the first YCS Prize.

    Marilyn Mossien '20

    Gala team

    Marilyn was one of the first first years to join the club. She played a fundamental role in the logistics of hosting the first Tech Gala.

    Tantan Wang '20

    Tantan was the first photographer of the TechSnaps team, helping capture stories of members of the Yale Computer Science community.

    Rishab Ramanathan '19

    Talks team

    Rishab was part of the Talks team, and helped invite and host speakers.

    Clark Xie '19

    Will Kortum, '19

    Lead Designer

    Will designed posters and online banners for our first events.

    Devon Merlette, '19

    Lead Designer

    Devon designed posters and online banners for our first events.

Leaving Fall 2016

    Wissem Gamra '18

    Treasurer

    Wissem served as our first Treasurer. He helped the club navigate the school bureocracy required to establish an organization, applying for grants to host events etc.

    Brian Kitano '19

    Brian was one of our very first members, and helped conceptualize the beginnings of the club.

    Sabrina Evans '19

    Community Director

    Sabrina was one of the first members of YCS. She was the first author of our weekly newsletters. She also established partnerships with tech organizations in New Haven.

The YCS is a undergraduate organization that promotes talks, workshops and study breaks related to computer science and engineering on Yale campus.

Email felipe.pires@y[you know the rest].edu with questions or suggestions.
